hadiths.text: ’Ali said:I shall not pay blood-money or (he said) : I am not going to pay blood-money for him on whom I inflicted the prescribed punishment except for the one who drank wine, for the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) did not prescribe anything definite. It is a thing which we have decided (by agreement) ourselves

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا تَتَابَعَ فِي شُرْبِ الْخَمْرِ
